context: A Mixture-of-Experts framework with adaptive routing among multiple YOLOv9-T experts improves object detection performance by achieving higher mAP and AR. This paper presents a novelMixture-of-Expertsframework for object detection, incorporatingadaptive routingamong multipleYOLOv9-Texperts to enabledynamic feature specializationand achieve highermean Average Precision(mAP) andAverage Recall(AR) compared to a singleYOLOv9-Tmodel. This paper presents a novel Mixture-of-Experts framework for object detection, incorporating adaptive routing among multiple YOLOv9-T experts to enable dynamic feature specialization and achieve higher mean Average Precision (mAP) and Average Recall (AR) compared to a single YOLOv9-T model. metadata.paper_name: YOLO Meets Mixture-of-Experts: Adaptive Expert Routing for Robust Object Detection
